text: The Mountain Fire was a wildfire in August, 2019 in the area of Jones Valley in Shasta County, several miles east of Redding, California. The fire broke out on Thursday, August 22, 2019 off Bear Mountain Road and Dry Creek Road, north of Bella Vista in Shasta County. Burning within the community of Jones Valley, the fire ultimately destroyed 14 structures including 7 homes,damaged 7 others and burned of forest land. At its peak, the Mountain Fire threatened over 1,100 homes and also lead to the evacuation of over 4,000 residents. Three people suffered minor injuries related to the fire, but no deaths were reported in the blaze. ==References== Category:2019 California wildfires Category:August 2019 events in the United States Category:Wildfires in Shasta County, California
